title: 點睇去福克蘭 Falklands建國?

replies.msg:
https://www.newyorker.com/magazine/2020/07/06/how-prosperity-transformed-the-falklands


In a referendum in 2013, all but three voters elected to remain a self-governing British territory, but the Falklands are no longer now as British as they were. They have become a place where people fetch up from all over the world, for all sorts of reasons—rootless wanderers, transient workers, people fleeing politics at home. In February, a small delegation arrived representing a group of Hong Kong Chinese who were nervous about Beijing.

replies.msg: 希望成事啦

大家要小心網絡安全，尤其是被咬過嘅手足，電話可能已經被入侵。港共可以用stingray大規模監控某個大範圍嘅所有電話，偷取IMSI(夠識別所有人)，甚至截取通訊。好多手足就係唔注重私隱同網絡安全被咬，好大機會包括被綁架12人; 記得追蹤基爾巴: https://lihkg.com/profile/96327
請簽署制裁綁架12人嘅支那官員:
https://petitions.whitehouse.gov/petition/sanction-chinese-officials-culpable-wrongfully-detaining-12-hong-kong-citizens-and-denying-their-right-counsel
[實用文] 教您點先可以保障私隱、網絡安全 (簡易版)
https://lihkg.com/thread/2194107
樓主可唔可以pin?唔該晒

In a referendum in 2013, all but three voters elected to remain a self-governing British territory, but the Falklands are no longer now as British as they were. They have become a place where people fetch up from all over the world, for all sorts of reasons—rootless wanderers, transient workers, people fleeing politics at home. In February, a small delegation arrived representing a group of Hong Kong Chinese who were nervous about Beijing.

pinned.msg:
大家要小心網絡安全，尤其是被咬過嘅手足，電話可能已經被入侵。港共可以用stingray大規模監控某個大範圍嘅所有電話，偷取IMSI(夠識別所有人)，甚至截取通訊。好多手足就係唔注重私隱同網絡安全被咬，好大機會包括被綁架12人; 記得追蹤基爾巴: https://lihkg.com/profile/96327
請簽署制裁綁架12人嘅支那官員:
https://petitions.whitehouse.gov/petition/sanction-chinese-officials-culpable-wrongfully-detaining-12-hong-kong-citizens-and-denying-their-right-counsel
[實用文] 教您點先可以保障私隱、網絡安全 (簡易版)
https://lihkg.com/thread/2194107
樓主可唔可以pin?唔該晒
